title: Backend Developer for Next.JS SaaS MVP
description: We are a dynamic and fast-growing technology company that is looking for an experienced Next.js backend developer to join our team and help us build modern and scalable web applications. In this role, you will have the opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies such as domain specific languages (DSLs), semantic search technologies, and AI (including GPT-3). You will be responsible for designing and implementing new features and functionality for our web applications, using the latest technologies and best practices. You will work closely with our team of developers, designers, and product managers to understand requirements, define solutions, and deliver high-quality code. To be successful in this role, you should have experience with Next.js and the React ecosystem, as well as a strong understanding of web development principles and technologies. You should also have experience working with DSLs, semantic search technologies, and AI (including GPT-3), and be comfortable using these technologies to solve complex problems. ## Key responsibilities: - Design and implement new features and functionality for our web applications using Next.js and React - Collaborate with the rest of the development team to understand requirements and define solutions - Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code that follows best practices - Test and debug code to ensure it is of high quality and meets requirements - Contribute to the development of our overall web application architecture and technical direction ## Requirements: - 3+ years of experience with Next.js and the React ecosystem - Strong understanding of web development principles and technologies, such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Node.js - Experience with agile methodologies and collaborating with others in a team environment - Knowledge of web application architecture and design patterns - Experience working with DSLs, semantic search technologies, and AI (including GPT-3) - Excellent communication skills and ability to work effectively in a team This is a unique opportunity to join a rapidly growing technology company and work on exciting and challenging projects. We offer a competitive salary, flexible work hours, remote work opportunities, and a range of other benefits and perks. If you are an experienced Next.js developer with a passion for working with the latest technologies and driving innovation, we would love to hear from you! Please submit your resume and portfolio to apply for this position.

title: High skilled Developer needed for ongoing work. Mern Stack
description: I am looking to start a content creators website. I am buying the website from a third party seller so the website it fully made and operational. I will have full control to customize the website to meet my needs. I am looking for an on going working relationship with the highly skilled developer who has 3+ years experience developing MERN stack applications. Also must have experience working with Agora.io as this is what powers the livestreaming part of the site. I also need a newly designed livestreaming module created for the site as the current one that comes with the site is not mobile friendly. If I am to buy this website, I need this corrected. To be sure you are able to do this work, please check out www.fanso.io as this is the application I will be buying that will need modification. Please let me know how much time will be needed to create a mobile friendly livestreaming module as the current one is not mobile friendly. Must speak fluent English, and available to work with me when needed to complete this work as effectively as possible. Excellent room for growth with the company for the right applicant. Would like to speak to you first and see if we are a good fit. Please have the skills I requested. Looking forward to meeting you :)

title: Need Interactive Brokers API expert
description: I have a manual futures options trading strategy that I have been trading successfully. I need a programmer who is able to automate my order execution as my strategy's main vulnerability is getting the orders to market quickly when markets are moving rapidly. The project will be 2 main parts: 1. When a trigger is met, 2-3 orders need to go out concurrently as limit orders with the mid/model price, whichever is more advantageous. 2. The limit price needs to move dynamically within the bid/ask spread if the orders do not execute right away.

title: Indian SAP FICO Consultant needed for US base projects
description: We are looking candidates who are based in India and have worked remotely for US companies as a FICO Consultants. The candidate will be mainly responsible for designing, building and deploying SAP-based ERP solutions; leading analysis and design in the SAP FI/CO area, often in close cooperation; Conducting structured testing internally and with users; Ensuring stabilization of the solution and continuous improvements. Responsibilities Experience in SAP FI and CO modules - General Ledger (GL), Accounts Payable (AP), Accounts Receivable (AR), Cost and Profit Center Accounting (CPA) and Internal Orders Configuration of SAP FI, and CO modules in IMG based on business requirements Looking for improvement opportunities in business systems Assisting in the testing process in order to discover errors and issues in business processes, documentation or user's lack of experience Application support and training of end users Cooperating with consultants from other modules such as MM, PM, PP and PS Implementing SAP Business Warehouse (BW) Sort out day-to-day queries of end users. Enhancement of the SAP for the end users based on requirements. Mapping the source data element for each data element in the target environment. Identify gaps, and issues and work around solutions. Requirements The minimum Qualification should be a Graduated/bachelor’s Minimum 03-05 years of working experience in a complete cycle implementation as well as in US projects Complete tax knowledge of the US Hand-on experience with a minimum of 3 - 5 implementations in the US and support projects of consolidation Strong FICO skills and Accounting Skills Proven 03-05 years experience in implementing SAP all in one HANA or ECC. Experience in FI integration points with other SAP modules like MM, HR, PP and PM. Ability to multitask and manage multiple deliverables and projects Good understanding of accounting business processes Ability to provide technical direction for complex SAP S/4 HANA issues Good interpersonal skills for interacting with team members and customers The candidate should be open to international and domestic travel. Only relevant and experienced candidates will be shortlisted. Kindly do not apply if you don't have US projects experience. Industry: Information Technology & Services Employment type: Full time permanent position

title: Looking for romance writer for ongoing projects
description: Simplified Upwork job posting. I am seeking a ghostwriter who is ready to develop a working relationship and assist me in creating stories to captivate readers. I need an experienced, passionate, and reliable ghostwriter to help me create a passionate and exciting trobe-driven contemporary romance. This assignment is for 3 books; see below First book 20K words Second book 40K words Third Book 50K words The budget for the budget is 1100.00/1 cent per word Requirements: -Able to write at least 15K words per week -I and looking for original and new content, that will captivate the reader. No plagiarism, or old ideas from other clients. -Able to complete summaries and chapter-by-chapter plot outlines. I will provide my theme and tropes. I desire the story to be trobe driven. -A accessible and communicative -Skilled and professional work ethic is essential. -The book must be complete 100% at my discretion, if revisions are needed you will be compensated. -I would like a phone interview first, and then a signed contract/NDA -I will like to review a few chapters of your best contemporary romance Please start your proposal with the phrase “I am ready to write” Thank you

title: Content writer; Academic assignments
description: As an academic writer, my job will involve researching, writing, and editing academic papers and other materials for publication. I may be required to work on a variety of projects, including research articles, theses, dissertations, and other academic documents. I may also be responsible for proofreading and editing the work of others, and may be expected to work collaboratively with other writers, researchers, and editors. Overall, my role as an academic writer will involve helping to create high-quality, well-written materials that meet the standards of academic publication

title: English to Pashto Translation

description: Hello everyone, We are an e-commerce business supplying different kinds of products, tools, materials for painting & decorating industry (including professionals & DIY) you can see our product range here: www.paintlab.ie As you can probably see from our website design that we are a top quality company and looking only for a qualified blog/content writer with experience in this industry. Please pm all your questions and I will get back to you as soon as I can. Best wishes, Rytis

title: Digital marketer with project management skills WANTED!
description: If you are experienced digital marketer with experience on European market - welcome! We are digital marketing agency, we are providing digital marketing services, such as Targeted ads, Websites, Video creation, SEO, Google ads etc. We are searching for digital marketer who can find customers for our company in North Europe: Denmark, Finland, Ireland, Norway, Sweden, and the United Kingdom. We are experienced in niche: sport&fitness, beauty&wellness, medical and dental clinics, food. This niches we have successsfull cases, and we would like to have customers further from these niches. In our team for your help we have designer, videographers, targetologist and google ads expert, website creators and project managers. What is need to be done: 1. Digital marketing strategy creation and implementation. 2. Set a task for designers, videographers, targetologists. Prepare everything for digital campaigns launch and provide us with quality leads.
